resources.string: AmongLock - Among Imposter Lock Screen and Wallpaper HD

"Turn on and it locks all soft key including HOME, RECENTS, BACK, MENU buttons.
You may be warned about potential privacy risk, that's just a regular informative warning for any accessibility service. We promise NEVER EVER collecting your personal information in this accessibility service."
This application requires your permission for lock your own phone when the lockscreen is not unlocked too long
Your phone will stay awake if you don\'t grant this permission
